positions.subtitle: Edfora
positions.description: •	Personalization for Engagement: Launched a personalized test series recommendation, driving a 20% engagement increase annually and boosting engagement by 12% quarterly with rank prediction models.•	Teacher Performance Excellence: Designed modules improving teacher performance by 40%; reduced costs by 25% with admin panels and feedback systems.•	Retention & Revenue Growth: Introduced gamification and triggers, achieving a 35% retention boost and a 15% revenue increase.•	Stakeholder Communication: Aligned internal and external teams on product vision and goals
positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description_html:
• Personalization for Engagement: Launched a personalized test series recommendation, driving a 20% engagement increase annually and boosting engagement by 12% quarterly with rank prediction models.
• Teacher Performance Excellence: Designed modules improving teacher performance by 40%; reduced costs by 25% with admin panels and feedback systems.
• Retention & Revenue Growth: Introduced gamification and triggers, achieving a 35% retention boost and a 15% revenue increase.
• Stakeholder Communication: Aligned internal and external teams on product vision and goals

positions.subtitle: Edfora
positions.description: •	Launched multiple products through cross-functional collaboration and streamlined onboarding flows, reducing drop-offs by 8%.•	Automated key processes, cutting academic operation costs by 20% annually.•	Developed dashboards for tracking engagement and adoption metrics.•	Standardized PRDs, reducing QA iterations by 15%, and effectively managed Agile cycles.
positions.title: Associate Product Manager
positions.description_html:
• Launched multiple products through cross-functional collaboration and streamlined onboarding flows, reducing drop-offs by 8%.
• Automated key processes, cutting academic operation costs by 20% annually.
• Developed dashboards for tracking engagement and adoption metrics.
• Standardized PRDs, reducing QA iterations by 15%, and effectively managed Agile cycles.
